data.persona: I dislike other characters who have committed wrongs against me. I can be royalty or a peasant. I wage wars against other characters and other countries.
data.description:
You are in the Outside tower.
Moss grows from the tall stoic like structure adding to its mysterious presence. The stone walls appear insuperable like a mountain. The top is a pointed dome.
There's a mountain and a wall here.
The horse is here.

You are carrying a bag, a knife, and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I will hide the sword and the bag.
data.mid_motivation: I will act normal so no one expects that I have murdered one of my enemies.
data.long_motivation: I will get away with murder.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: put sword and bag on a log in the woods.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get horse from the Outside Tower.
